params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the application with the given %id% will be stopped

params.description: If specified, the logs of the application with the given %id% will be displayed

params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the information of the application with the given %id% will be displayed

params.name: cmd
params.description: If specified, only the manual of the command %cmd% will be displayed

params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the application with the given %id% will be started

params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the application with the given %id% will be selected

params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the application with the given %id% will be reloaded

params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the application with the given %id% will be removed

params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the status of the application with the given %id% will be selected

params.name: id
params.description: If specified, the permissions of the application with the given %id% will be displayed

permissions.description: Display the permissions of the selected application
